assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This manuscript is supported by Cooperative Agreement no. U60HM000803 funded by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). Its contents are solely the responsibility of the authors and do not necessarily represent the official views of CDC or the Department of Health and Human Services.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Kofi A Anie, Marsha J Treadwell, Althea M Grant, Jemima A Dennis-Antwi, Mabel K Asafo, Mary E Lamptey, Jelili Ojodu, Careema Yusuf, Ayo Otaigbe, and Kwaku Ohene-Frempong declare that they have no conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This article does not contain any studies with human participants or animals performed by any of the authors.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was not required since this is a report of proceedings of a workshop and not a study of human participants.
